hackathon-description-text: Join Appathon 2015, the UniCredit hackathon that will take place on 7-8 November 2015 in Munich, Vienna and Milan simultaneously. Join Appathon 2015 in one of these countries! It will give you the chance to meet prestigous experts, learn from UniCredit mentors and have fun with people who love hackathons like you. It will be an extraordinary experience in terms of innovative thinking, technology and fun.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Director Innovations Multi Channel Management, HypoVereinsbank
Head of Product & Business Development Private Banking & Wealth Management, HypoVereinsbank
Country Manager, UniCredit Business Integrated Solution Germany
Head of Service Line ICT, UniCredit Business Integrated Solutions Branch Germany
Direktor Finanzinstitute und Private Geschäftsbanken IBM Deutschland GmbH

hackathon-requirements:
Please fill out this project documentation template before submitting your projects. This is one of the judging criteria.
: What's the working title of your project?
: In three sentences – what's your idea?
Please make a screenshot of your project and upload here.
: Web app, mobile app, data visualization?
: What's the minimum viable product? Which features does it have?
: Who should use your product?
: How will users typically use this product?
: What was the most difficult part of the project? What problems did you encounter? How did you solve them?
: How can the project be further developed?
: Which frameworks and solutions did you use?
: Please insert the deployment link. This is crucial. Try not to host things just locally.
(optional): Please insert the link to your project's GitHub repository.
: i.e. Uli (organizer),
hackathon-rules:
Our recommendation: You can register for the event as individual person or as team. However, we recommend to find your team mates already ahead of the Appathon. To find more people looking for a team mate, you can follow us on 
 with the Hashtag #appathon2015, like us on 
 or visit and of course share the 
.
Any more questions regarding the Appathon in Munich? Get in touch with our HypoVereinsbank Appathon Team in Germany:
If you come alone, you will be able to connect to other participants at the get-together on Friday, 6 Nov (start: 6.0 pm, address: HVB Forum, Guest Lounge, entrance via Pranner-Str. 4, 80333 Munich) or on Saturday morning until 9 am.
You are 
 allowed to write any code in advance.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Swagbag + a GoPro 4 Black for each team member of the V-TService winning team
a ticket for each team member of the TRJ winning team for the next “The Royal Jungle Airways” (March 2016)
1.000 Euro in cash for the team with the best integration of the  organize.me API
an Apple iWatch for each team member of the Gini winning team
a 100€ Amazon voucher for each team member in the figo winning team
